title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Evolution is a necessary part of growth. You might find it cringeworthy if the sole-stated reason for a person or company favoring one method over another is because of tradition. You can be so progressive in your thinking that it is difficult to muster up much patience for stalwart adherence to the status quo. However, small changes made in delicate increments could be the least disruptive way to proceed when an update is required. A little of this, a little of that, and all of a sudden, innovation is knocking at your door. A perfect mix of the old and the new cultivates a creative environment. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
